name: Payout Hub
overview:
PayoutHub is a white-label, cut-and-paste widget allowing online game developers to run cash tournaments on their games. Itâ€™s simple to integrate, totally secure, and they manage all payments and accounts. It can be incorporated in almost any online game with scores.

Key Features: Simple Intergration PayoutHub can be implemented in less than an hour. Simply copy and paste our code snippets onto your site or application for quickest implementation.

Managed Payouts They handle all payments to your players when they win cash prizes. You don’t have to worry about the legalities, tax issues, and payment logistics!

JSON API Using the JSON API, publishers with dynamic applications can create rich, highly customized user experiences.

Complete Customization Publishers can leverage PayoutHub’s JSON feed or inject your own CSS stylesheets for complete customization of the PayoutHub look and feel, or to embed it into 3rd party platforms such as Flash.

Managed Customer Service PayoutHub handles all customer service inquiries and payment issues from your players 24/7.

Robust Reporting Monitor your earnings performance in real-time. They provide a full reporting suite and offer monthly statements and complete transaction logs.
